summary: Frontend testing completed for dual mode feature (Événements/Professionnels). All requested features are working correctly.
passed_tests: /welcome page: Mode selection page loads correctly with both 'Événements' and 'Professionnels' cards
/welcome page: Events card shows correct categories (Photographe, DJ, Traiteur, Décorateur, Fleuriste)
/welcome page: Pro card shows correct categories (Électricien, Plombier, Serrurier, Peintre, Menuisier)
Mode selection: Clicking 'Événements' saves mode='events' to localStorage and redirects to /home
Mode selection: Clicking 'Professionnels' saves mode='pro' to localStorage and redirects to /home
/home Events mode: Navbar shows 'Lumière Events' with gold/yellow theme
/home Events mode: Mode indicator badge shows 'Événements' with sparkle icon
/home Events mode: Hero shows 'PLATEFORME ÉVÉNEMENTIELLE PREMIUM' and 'Votre évènement parfait commence ici'
/home Events mode: 'Mode Événements' badge visible on hero image
/home Events mode: 'Voir les services professionnels' link visible to switch modes
/home Events mode: Categories section shows 'Nos catégories événementielles'
/home Pro mode: Navbar shows 'Lumière Pro' with blue theme
/home Pro mode: Mode indicator badge shows 'Professionnels' with wrench icon
/home Pro mode: Hero shows 'SERVICES PROFESSIONNELS' and 'Des artisans qualifiés pour tous vos travaux'
/home Pro mode: 'Mode Professionnels' badge visible on hero image
/home Pro mode: 'Voir les événements' link visible to switch modes
/home Pro mode: Categories section shows 'Nos corps de métier'
/search Events mode: Page title shows 'Find the perfect vendor'
/search Events mode: Category pills show event categories (Photographe, Vidéaste, DJ, Traiteur, Fleuriste, Décorateur, etc.)
/search Events mode: 'Mode Événements' indicator visible
/search Events mode: 'Voir les professionnels' button visible
/search Pro mode: Page title shows 'Trouver un artisan'
/search Pro mode: Category pills show pro categories (Électricien, Plombier, Serrurier, Peintre, Menuisier, etc.)
/search Pro mode: 'Mode Professionnels' indicator visible
/search Pro mode: 'Voir les événements' button visible
Mode switching: Clicking mode indicator in navbar clears mode and redirects to /welcome
Mode switching: Clicking 'Voir les services professionnels/événements' button clears mode and redirects to /welcome
Backend API: GET /api/categories/events returns 10 event categories
Backend API: GET /api/categories/pro returns 10 professional categories
critical_code_review_comments: ModeSelectionPage.js: Clean implementation with localStorage persistence and navigate('/home') on mode selection
SiteModeContext.js: Proper React context with localStorage sync, clearMode function, and theme configuration for both modes
HomePage.js: Correctly uses useSiteMode() hook to adapt content (hero, categories, features, CTA) based on mode
SearchPage.js: Correctly fetches categories from /api/categories/{mode} and displays mode-specific category pills
Navbar.js: Shows mode indicator badge with correct styling (gold for events, blue for pro) and clearMode on click
App.js: ModeGuard component correctly redirects to /welcome when no mode is set
server.py: GET /api/categories/{mode} endpoint returns correct categories for 'events' and 'pro' modes
context_for_next_testing_agent: Dual mode feature (Événements/Professionnels) is fully functional. Mode selection at /welcome works, /home and /search pages adapt content based on mode, navbar shows correct branding and mode indicator, and mode switching via navbar indicator or 'Voir les...' buttons works correctly. The backend /api/categories/{mode} endpoint returns different categories for each mode.
